what: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA.
title: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA.
text: goal ElectricVehiclesR package study statistics behind electric vehicles State Washington United States America. RShiny app included within package provides interactivity user view various plots filter according test combinations criteria come upon personal electric vehicles options. can view -depth guide package website. NOTE: Upon launching RShiny app, may appear laggy, slow, plots may appearing. Please allow app approximately 15-30 seconds boot correctly. caused various large datasets app depends upon.

title: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA.
text: can install development version ElectricVehiclesR GitHub :

title: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA.
text: basic example shows produce plots main dataset clean_vehicle:
code: library(ElectricVehiclesR) library(tidyverse)  clean_vehicle |>   group_by(model_year) |>   summarize(average_range = mean(electric_range, na.rm = TRUE)) |>   ggplot(aes(x = model_year,               y = average_range)) +   geom_line() +   geom_point() +   labs(title = "Average Electric Range by Model Year",        x = "Model Year",        y = "Average Electric Range (miles)") +   theme_bw()

what: ElectricVehiclesR: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA. — ElectricVehiclesR-package
title: ElectricVehiclesR: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA. — ElectricVehiclesR-package
text: package includes RShiny app analyzes electric vehicles State Washington, USA. app allows users test combinations variables reach conclusions regarding electric vehicles.

title: ElectricVehiclesR: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA. — ElectricVehiclesR-package
text: package contains following functions: filter_vehicles: Filters dataset based electric range, make, vehicle type. summary_filtered_data: Generates summary statistics filtered data. load_app: Launches Shiny app interactively explore electric vehicle options.

title: ElectricVehiclesR: Examining Electric Vehicle Data in Washington State, USA. — ElectricVehiclesR-package
text: data extracted Kaggle titled "Electric Vehicle Population". can access .

text: Maintainer: Rayyan Aamir raam0001@student.monash.edu

title: Electric Vehicle Data — clean_vehicle
text: data frame 181038 rows 13 columns county Name county data gathered city Name city data gathered state Name state data gathered postal_code postal code data present model_year Manufacturing year model mentioned dataset make Manufacturer vehicle model Model Name mentioned vehicle electric_vehicle_type Type electric vehicle present dataset clean_alternative_fuel_vehicle_cafv_eligibility Clean Alternative Fuel Vehicle (CAFV) eligibility data present dataset electric_range electric range car provides vehicle_location Vehicle coordinates lon Longitude vehicle's location lat Latitude vehicle's location

title: Electric Vehicle Data — clean_vehicle
text: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jainaru/electric-vehicle-population/data

what: Filter Vehicles Based on User Preferences — filter_vehicles
title: Filter Vehicles Based on User Preferences — filter_vehicles
text: function filters dataset based user-selected electric range, car make, type vehicle, model year.

title: Filter Vehicles Based on User Preferences — filter_vehicles
code: filter_vehicles(   data,   mileage_range = c(0, 500),   car_make = NULL,   vehicle_type = NULL,   year_range = NULL )

title: Filter Vehicles Based on User Preferences — filter_vehicles
text: data dataset filter (dataframe). mileage_range numeric vector length 2 indicating range desired electric mileage. car_make character vector car makes include. vehicle_type character vector vehicle types include. year_range numeric vector length 2 indicating range desired model years.

title: Filter Vehicles Based on User Preferences — filter_vehicles
text: filtered dataframe based user's provided criteria.

text: Simplified Grid Counts Dataset Leaflet Plot Creation

title: Simplified Grid Counts Dataset For Leaflet Plot Creation — grid_counts_simplified
Simplified Grid Counts Dataset For Leaflet Plot Creation — grid_counts_simplified
text: data frame 542 rows 2 columns geometry grouped lat long values representing location count count EVs respective grouped location

title: Loading the Rshiny app — load_app
text: function launches RShiny app allows user explore Electric Vehicle data come upon conclusions.

title: Summarize Filtered Vehicle Data — summary_filtered_data
text: function provides comprehensive summary filtered dataset, including average, median, min, max electric range, common makes, vehicle type distribution percentages.

title: Summarize Filtered Vehicle Data — summary_filtered_data
text: data dataframe containing filtered vehicle data. include columns electric range, make, electric vehicle type.

title: Summarize Filtered Vehicle Data — summary_filtered_data
text: list following elements: avg_electric_range Average electric range across filtered dataset. median_electric_range Median electric range across filtered dataset. min_electric_range Minimum electric range filtered dataset. max_electric_range Maximum electric range filtered dataset. top_common_makes Vector top one three common vehicle makes filtered dataset. vehicle_type_percentage Named vector showing percentage distribution vehicle types.
